articles.title: Former Dutch Prime Minister and wife die hand in hand via duo euthanasia - India Today
articles.description: Former Dutch Prime Minister Dries van Agt and his wife Eugenie went through duo euthanasia at the age of 93
articles.content: Dries van Agt, a prominent figure in Dutch politics and the former Prime Minister, and his wife Eugenie, chose to end their lives through the practice of duo euthanasia. The couple passed away in the… [+1736 chars]
